name: SetRunnerLabels
description:
Update custom labels for a self-hosted runner in a GitHub repo.

This tool removes existing custom labels and sets new ones for a specific self-hosted runner in a GitHub repository. It requires authentication with an access token that has the 'repo' scope.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. This is not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: runner_id
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier of the self-hosted runner to update labels for.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

parameters.name: custom_labels_for_runner
parameters.description: An array of custom labels to set for the self-hosted runner. Pass an empty array to clear all labels.

value_schema.description: The names of the custom labels to set for the runner. You can pass an empty array to remove all custom labels.
